npcMessage.comment: Well, there is certainly an Imperial presence, although I don't think that the officers on duty would consider it a vacation. The pilot trainer that I know there is Lt. Barn Sinkko. He is part of the Imperial Inquisition, which requires a lot from their pilots. Is this what you want?

playerMessage.comment: The Inquisition? Maybe not. I'd like to choose someone else.
May I start over? Perhaps the Imperial Navy isn't what I want to do.
